## Using JSX

Full:

> <include>./test.mdx</include>

First Heading:

> <include>./test.mdx#heading</include>

In JSX:

> <include>./test.mdx#section-in-jsx</include>

In Directive:

> <include>./test.mdx#section-in-directive</include>

## Using Directives

In Directive:

> :::include
> ./test.mdx#section-in-directive
> :::

Inline Directive:

> ::include[./test.mdx#section-in-directive]

## Code

> <include>./code.ts</include>

With Region:

> <include>./code.ts#a</include>

With Nested Region:

> <include>./code.ts#b</include>

> <include>./code.ts#c</include>
